answers.answer: Many have no symptoms to pre diabetes.  Just like high BP many have no symptoms.  In diabetes by the time you get symptoms you are well on the diabetes road.  The ONLY way to tell is with a blood test.  the best to get is a Oral Glucose Tolerance Test (OGTT)
sugar can truly be addictive.however, suggest you see your dr and get tested for diabetes, thyroid, etc.You may need to go cold turkey to get off the sugar....

question: I was wondering if anyone knows what theses might be, and how they manifest.  I am a total sugar junkie now, when I have never been in my life.  I could eat sugary foods constantly, and feel very cranky when I don't get them.  This can be many things, but I was wondering if any diabetes out there saw this warning sign before they were diagnosed?
title: Pre diabetes symptoms
